prompts.title: Create an Instagram Story Highlight Cover
prompts.content: Design an Instagram Story Highlight cover featuring {icon_theme} and {color_palette}. Ensure it aligns with {brand_identity} and appeals to {target_audience}.
prompts.description: Generates a design brief for Instagram Story Highlight covers.

variables.name: icon_theme
variables.description: The theme or style of icons to use.

variables.name: color_palette
variables.description: The set of colors to incorporate.
variables.example: pastel shades of pink and blue

variables.name: brand_identity
variables.description: Core elements of the brand's identity.

prompts.title: Compose a LinkedIn Article on Leadership
prompts.content: Write a 500-word LinkedIn article about {leadership_topic}, incorporating {personal_experiences} and {industry_statistics}. Conclude with {actionable_advice}.
prompts.description: Creates a professional article to establish authority on leadership topics.

variables.name: leadership_topic
variables.description: Specific aspect of leadership to focus on.

variables.name: personal_experiences
variables.example: challenges faced while managing a remote team

variables.name: industry_statistics
variables.description: Data to support the article's points.
variables.example: increase in productivity by remote teams by 20%

prompts.title: Plan a Social Media Takeover
prompts.content: Outline a plan for {guest_person} to take over our {platform} account on {date}. Define {content_schedule}, {engagement_strategies}, and {goals}.
prompts.description: Creates a detailed plan for a social media account takeover to boost engagement.

variables.name: guest_person
variables.description: The individual who will take over the account.

variables.name: platform
variables.description: The social media platform to be used.

variables.name: content_schedule
variables.example: 3 posts and 5 stories throughout the day

variables.name: goals
variables.description: Objectives to achieve through the takeover.
variables.example: increase follower count by 10%, boost engagement rate

prompts.title: Generate a Social Media Analytics Report
prompts.content: Compile a report analyzing {metrics} for our {platform} accounts over the past {time_period}. Include insights on {audience_behavior} and recommendations for {improvement_areas}.
prompts.description: Produces a comprehensive social media analytics report.

variables.name: metrics
variables.example: engagement rate, follower growth, click-through rate

variables.name: audience_behavior
variables.description: Patterns in how the audience interacts.

variables.name: improvement_areas
variables.description: Areas where performance can be enhanced.

prompts.title: Create a Social Media Crisis Response Plan
prompts.content: Develop a plan to address {potential_crisis} on {platforms}. Outline {communication_strategies}, assign {team_roles}, and prepare {template_responses}.
prompts.description: Prepares a response plan for handling social media crises.

variables.name: potential_crisis
variables.description: The type of crisis to prepare for.

variables.name: communication_strategies
variables.description: Approach to communicating during the crisis.

variables.name: team_roles
variables.description: Roles and responsibilities of team members.
variables.example: PR manager handles statements, social media manager monitors comments

variables.name: template_responses
variables.example: apology messages, redirection to customer support

prompts.title: Design a Facebook Ad Campaign
prompts.content: Plan a Facebook ad campaign targeting {audience_demographics}. Set objectives for {campaign_goals}, define {budget}, and select {ad_formats}.
prompts.description: Creates a blueprint for a targeted Facebook advertising campaign.

variables.name: budget
variables.description: Total budget allocated for the campaign.

variables.name: ad_formats
variables.description: Types of Facebook ads to use.

prompts.title: Compose a YouTube Community Post
prompts.content: Write a YouTube community post to announce {update}. Include {visuals} and encourage subscribers to {engagement_action}.
prompts.description: Engages YouTube subscribers through community posts.

variables.name: update
variables.description: The news or update to share.
variables.example: new video series launching next week

variables.name: visuals
variables.example: teaser image from the upcoming video

variables.name: engagement_action
variables.description: An action to encourage subscriber interaction.

prompts.title: Develop a Hashtag Strategy
prompts.content: Create a list of {number_of_hashtags} hashtags for {campaign_theme}. Ensure they are relevant, have {popularity_metrics}, and align with {brand_voice}.
prompts.description: Generates a strategic set of hashtags to increase post visibility.

variables.name: number_of_hashtags
variables.description: The total number of hashtags to create.

variables.name: campaign_theme
variables.description: The central theme of the campaign.

variables.name: brand_voice
variables.description: The tone and style of the brand.

prompts.title: Create an Instagram Reel Script
prompts.content: Draft a script for an Instagram Reel about {topic}. Include {key_points}, plan {visual_elements}, and end with {call_to_action}. Keep it under {duration} seconds.
prompts.description: Produces a script for an engaging Instagram Reel.

variables.name: visual_elements
variables.example: close-up shots of ingredients, text overlays

prompts.title: Outline a Live Stream Event
prompts.content: Plan a live stream on {platform} featuring {guest_speaker}. Define {topics_to_cover}, schedule for {date_time}, and promote using {marketing_channels}.
prompts.description: Creates a plan for hosting a successful live stream event.

variables.name: platform
variables.description: Platform to host the live stream.

variables.name: guest_speaker
variables.description: Person who will speak or present.

variables.name: date_time
variables.description: When the live stream will occur.

prompts.title: Design an Infographic for Social Sharing
prompts.content: Create an infographic on {subject_matter} suitable for sharing on {platforms}. Include {data_points}, use {design_style}, and ensure it adheres to {dimensions}.
prompts.description: Generates a design brief for creating a shareable infographic.

variables.name: data_points
variables.description: Key statistics or facts to include.

prompts.title: Compose a Social Media Thank You Post
prompts.content: Write a heartfelt post thanking {milestone_achievement}. Include {user_generated_content} and express gratitude towards {community}.
prompts.description: Creates a post to thank followers and celebrate milestones.

prompts.title: Plan a Social Media Giveaway
prompts.content: Outline a giveaway campaign on {platform}. Decide on {prizes}, set {entry_requirements}, and schedule for {duration}. Ensure compliance with {platform_policies}.
prompts.description: Prepares a plan for a social media giveaway to increase engagement.

variables.name: platform
variables.description: Social media platform for the giveaway.

variables.name: prizes
variables.description: Items or experiences to be won.
variables.example: a free annual subscription to our service

variables.name: entry_requirements
variables.description: What users must do to enter.
variables.example: like the post, follow our account, tag a friend

prompts.title: Write a Social Media Press Release
prompts.content: Draft a press release suitable for sharing on {platforms} announcing {news_event}. Include {quotes_from_leadership} and {key_highlights}.
prompts.description: Creates a press release to share significant news on social media.

variables.name: platforms
variables.description: Social media platforms to share on.

variables.name: news_event
variables.description: The event or news being announced.
variables.example: our company's merger with XYZ Corp

prompts.title: Create a Social Media FAQ Series
prompts.content: Develop a series of posts addressing frequently asked questions about {topic}. Provide clear answers and use {visual_aids} to enhance understanding.
prompts.description: Generates content to address common customer inquiries.

prompts.title: Develop a Social Media Meme
prompts.content: Create a meme for {platform} that relates to {industry_trend}. Use {popular_template} and ensure it resonates with {target_audience}.
prompts.description: Produces a humorous meme to increase shareability.

variables.name: platform
variables.description: Social media platform for the meme.

variables.name: industry_trend
variables.description: Current trend or event in the industry.

variables.name: target_audience
variables.description: Audience the meme should appeal to.

prompts.title: Compose a Social Media Countdown Post
prompts.content: Write a series of posts counting down to {event}. Include {teasers} and use {hashtags} to build excitement.
prompts.description: Creates a countdown campaign to generate anticipation.

variables.name: teasers
variables.description: Sneak peeks or hints to share.

prompts.title: Draft a Social Media Policy Document
prompts.content: Create a policy document outlining {guidelines} for employees' use of {social_media_platforms}. Include sections on {acceptable_use}, {privacy}, and {brand_reputation}.
prompts.description: Develops a policy to guide employee social media usage.

variables.name: guidelines
variables.description: Rules and best practices to include.

variables.name: acceptable_use
variables.example: sharing public company news, engaging positively

variables.name: privacy
variables.description: Rules regarding privacy and data protection.

variables.name: brand_reputation
variables.description: Guidelines to protect the company's image.

prompts.title: Create a Social Media Trend Report
prompts.content: Compile a report on the latest trends in {social_media_landscape}. Analyze {emerging_platforms}, {content_formats}, and {user_behaviors}. Provide {recommendations} for adaptation.
prompts.description: Produces a report to inform strategy based on current social media trends.

variables.name: user_behaviors
variables.description: How users are interacting with content.

prompts.title: Compose an Employee Spotlight Post
prompts.content: Write a post highlighting {employee_name} from the {department}. Share their {achievements} and include a {personal_quote}. Add {visuals} to enhance the post.
prompts.description: Creates a post to recognize employee contributions.

variables.name: achievements
variables.example: led the development of our new AI algorithm

variables.name: visuals
variables.example: professional headshot, photo of them at work

prompts.title: Develop a Social Media Outreach Plan
prompts.content: Create a plan to reach out to {influencers_bloggers} in {industry}. Outline {communication_strategies}, set {goals}, and prepare {collaboration_proposals}.
prompts.description: Generates a strategy for connecting with key online personalities.

prompts.title: Write a Social Media Testimonial Request
prompts.content: Draft a message requesting {customers_clients} to share testimonials about {product_service}. Offer {incentives} and provide {instructions} on how to submit.
prompts.description: Encourages satisfied customers to provide testimonials.

variables.name: customers_clients
variables.description: The audience to request testimonials from.

variables.name: product_service
variables.description: What they should provide feedback on.

variables.name: incentives
variables.example: a 10% discount on their next purchase

variables.name: instructions
variables.description: How they can submit their testimonials.
variables.example: reply to this message or fill out our online form

prompts.title: Create a Social Media Success Story
prompts.content: Write a post sharing the success story of {client_name} who achieved {results} using {product_service}. Include {data_points} and a {call_to_action}.
prompts.description: Highlights a client's success to showcase product effectiveness.

variables.name: client_name
variables.description: Name of the client or company.

variables.name: product_service
variables.description: What they used to achieve success.

variables.name: data_points
variables.example: reduced project completion time from 4 weeks to 2 weeks

variables.name: call_to_action
variables.description: Prompt for readers to take action.
variables.example: Learn how we can help your business too

prompts.title: Design a Social Media Quiz
prompts.content: Develop an interactive quiz for {platform} titled {quiz_title}. Create {number_of_questions} questions related to {topic}, and provide {results_interpretation}.
prompts.description: Engages the audience through an interactive quiz.

variables.name: platform
variables.description: Platform where the quiz will be hosted.

variables.name: results_interpretation
variables.example: personalized tips based on their productivity style

prompts.title: Plan a Social Media Storytelling Series
prompts.content: Outline a series of posts that tell the story of {brand_journey}. Divide the story into {number_of_parts}, each focusing on {key_milestones}.
prompts.description: Engages followers by sharing the brand's history and evolution.

variables.name: key_milestones
variables.example: founding, first product launch, major partnerships

prompts.title: Write a Social Media Survey Invitation
prompts.content: Compose an invitation for followers to participate in a survey about {survey_topic}. Mention {incentives} and explain how their feedback will {benefit}.
prompts.description: Encourages audience participation in a survey to gather insights.

variables.name: benefit
variables.description: How their feedback will be used.

prompts.title: Create a Social Media Event Recap
prompts.content: Write a post summarizing {event_name}. Include {highlights}, share {photos_videos}, and thank {participants_sponsors}.
prompts.description: Provides an overview of an event to inform those who couldn't attend.

prompts.title: Compose a Social Media Thank You Note
prompts.content: Write a heartfelt thank you note to {specific_group} for {reason}. Include {personal_touch} to make it sincere.
prompts.description: Expresses gratitude to a specific group for their support or contribution.

variables.name: specific_group
variables.example: volunteers who helped at our event

variables.name: reason
variables.description: What you are thanking them for.

variables.name: personal_touch
variables.description: Additional details to personalize the message.

prompts.title: Design a Social Media Educational Series
prompts.content: Plan a series of posts to educate followers about {subject_matter}. Break down the content into {number_of_posts} parts, each covering {subtopics}.
prompts.description: Provides valuable information to the audience over a series of posts.

variables.name: subject_matter
variables.description: The main topic of the series.

variables.name: number_of_posts
variables.description: Total number of posts in the series.

variables.name: subtopics
variables.description: Specific areas to cover in each post.
variables.example: SEO, content marketing, social media advertising
